Class Compositor

extends java.lang.Object

    Compositor for JPX image data
    Since:
    14/02/2013
    Author:
    Dylan McCarthy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Compositor(kdu_jni.Jpx_source input_src, ImagePanel display)
      Takes the input from the JPX source and processes it then outputs it to the ImagePanel that is being used to display the image

    • Constructor Detail

      • Compositor

        public Compositor(kdu_jni.Jpx_source input_src,
          ImagePanel display)
           throws kdu_jni.KduException
        Takes the input from the JPX source and processes it then outputs it to the ImagePanel that is being used to display the image
        Parameters:
        input_src - - This is a Jpx_source input, usually obtained through wrapping the JPIP Reader in a Jp2_famly_source object then to a Jpx_source
        display - - The ImagePanel that the image is to be displayed on
        Throws:
        kdu_jni.KduException

        public void start(Reader reader)
        Start the compositor and set up initial properties
        Parameters:
        reader - - the Reader which is connected to the JPIP source

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the compositor and clean up threads

      • updateDisplay

        public ImagePanel updateDisplay()
        Update the display by returning the latest ImagePanel object
        Returns:
        ImagePanel object which holds the current image
